FuncDef: The display any-flow flow-cache resource command displays resource information in the hardware flow table. The display any-flow flow-cache resource command displays resource information in the hardware flow table. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: You can use the display any-flow flow-cache resource command to view resource usage details in the hardware flow table.
